fileSizeAlert: The file size should not exceed 4 MB
fileShare: The file has been shared successfully
workingHourMessageHeader: We regret that we are unable to serve you at this time
name: Name
confirmation_approval: Please check the pledge box to proceed
confirmation_text: I, as a user of this service, hereby pledge not to record this call and to maintain the confidentiality of the information discussed, in compliance with all provisions and regulations outlined in the Anti-Cybercrime Bylaw issued by Royal Decree No. M/17 dated 08/03/1428, and all relevant laws and regulations
record_text: I pledge my commitment to the proper appearance, uniform, and place before and during the use of the service. and if otherwise, the call will be terminated, and the relevant regulations and instructions applied.
recordMessage: In accordance with the Communications and Information Technology System, issued by the Council of Ministers' Decision No. (592) on the date 1/11/1443 AH, and its executive regulation regarding the protection of personal data of users in the telecommunications, space, and technology sectors, the calls is recorded for the purpose of improving the quality of the services provided. These recordings are protected and used only for training our employees and ensuring the provision of outstanding service. We guarantee the confidentiality and privacy of the information contained in these calls in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations
message: This service facilitates conducting a virtual visit, and communicating with customer service representatives through video calls conveniently and easily
otp_header: Please enter the verification code sent to the mobile number registered in Absher
activate_mic_camera: Please activate the Camera and MIC
waiting_message_1: Our customer service representatives are serving other customers and you will be answered as soon as possible. Please do not refresh or close the page.
rating_message: We hope you participate in this survey, which aims to measure your satisfaction and take advantage of your feedback that will effectively contribute to the team to improve your experience.
rating_q1: How satisfied are you with the quality of the provided service?
rating_q2: How satisfied are you with the quality of the service provided by the employee?
rating_q3: How satisfied are you with the quality of the service provided by the employee?
after_rating_message_2: Your satisfaction is our priority and we look forward to serving you better.
entity_option_2: Ministry of Municipal Rural Affairs & Housing
waitMsgL1: We appreciate your waiting. The number of customers waiting ahead of you:
waitMsgL2: a customer service agent will assist you soon....
thanksMsgL1: Thank you for participating with us to enhance our services.
urg_call_mssg: In a hurry and want us to serve you now? Try our Chat Bot!
estab_admin_messg: This service allows the establishers to modify the structure of their facilities by separating a branch from the main facility, or linking a facility with another facility through the authority of the branch account manager
report_eq_messg: This service allows reporting an occupational injury that occurred to one of the contributors of the assigned treatment entity or the competent insurance office
delink_link_messg: This service allows the establishers to modify the structure of their establishments by separating a branch from the main establishment, or linking an establishment with another establishment through the authority of the branch account manager
add_saudi_messg: This service allows the addition of (non-Saudi contributor/Gulf contributor/non-Saudi contributor with a distinguished residence/private expatriate/contributor from the displaced tribes under the establisher).
tract_req_messg: This service allows the user to follow up on applications or transactions submitted to the General Organization for Social Insurance through the service centers, the website and applications of the organization for smart devices
visit_emp_messg: This service allows the establisher to communicate with the customer service representative directly through a video call
service_virtual_visit: This service facilitates conducting a virtual visit, and communicating with customer service representatives through video calls conveniently and easily
unavaibility_message: Dear customers, we apologize that the service is currently unavailable, and we are happy to serve you during working hours
date_avail1: From Sunday to Thursday between 08:00 am to 06:00 pm
date_avail4: From Sunday to Thursday between 08:00 am to 02:00 pm
message_unavailable: Dear customer, Sorry, the browser used is not supported, we hope you change the browser and use Google Chrome Thank you for contacting us through the virtual visit service
message_waiting_unavailable: Dear customer, we appreciate your time, and we inform you that all employees are busy serving other customers. We hope that you will try again later, and we will be happy to serve you through other communication channels. You can benefit from our electronic services by visiting
thanks_filling_form: Thank you for filling out the form
merge_descision: The merger decision does not change or affect the mechanism for applying for services and transactions.
insurance_system_text: Is there a change in the procedures for applying for combining subscription periods (exchanging benefits between the civil and military retirement systems and the insurance system) between the two institutions?
merge_periods: The merger does not affect the application procedures for adding periods.
merge_institution: Does the merger affect the workflow of current transactions at the two institutions?
merge_transaction: The merger does not impact the existing transactional workflow of the two institutions.
national_day_message: Dear customers, we congratulate you on the founding day of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and we inform you that the service is currently not available Work will resume starting Thursday, February 23, 2023 AD - at 8:00 AM. To benefit from our electronic services, we are happy for you to visit our page.
complete_transaction: You can also complete your transaction by visiting the links below.
insurance_requests: Follow up on insurance system requests
retirement_requests: Follow up on requests for retirement systems
insurance_system2: Taking care of insurance system clients
retirement_system2: Taking care of retirement system clients
customer_service_represntation: Please writing your inquiry and a customer service representative will respond to you as soon as possible
share_opinion: Please share your opinion with us, to help us improve our performance and serve you better
upload_file: Please upload the file in (pdf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg) format only, without the file size exceeding 2 MB.
answer_inquiry: We are happy to serve you and answer your inquiries.
chat_unav: Sorry, the instant chat service is currently unavailable
aval_workHour: We will only be available to serve you during business hours
displayActivateAlert: In order for us to serve you, please activate your camera and microphone
notSentOtpAlert: The verification code could not be sent, please try again later
unsupportedMessage:
Dear Valued Client,
To ensure you have the best possible experience using our service, we kindly recommend using a supported web browser.
Here is a list of compatible browsers for different devices:
unsupportedMessageP1: Web: Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, and Google Search
unsupportedMessageP2: iOS: Apple Safari and Google Search
unsupportedMessageP3: Android: Google Search, Google Chrome and the built-in Android browser (may vary by device)
unsupportedMessagLast: Please note that the service does not work when using unsupported browsers. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
working_hours_intro: The official working hours of the Virtual Visit Service:
working_hours_sunday_thursday: Sunday to Thursday: 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM
service_description: This service allows the possibility of holding a virtual visit and communicating with a customer service representative
communication_note: through visual communication with ease and convenience

waiting_room_description: You will be directly transferred to the specialized employee.
waiting_queue_message: Number of customers ahead of you:
visit_satisfaction: How satisfied are you with the virtual visit service?
employee_satisfaction: How satisfied are you with the service provided by the employee?
insurance_types_required: Insurance type is required when service type is Insurance
speaker: Speaker
please_provide_reason: Please provide a reason for your dissatisfaction with the service
participation_note: We hope you will participate in this survey aimed at measuring your satisfaction and benefiting from your feedback, which will effectively contribute to the team’s efforts to improve your experience
reason_for_bad_rating_label: Please mention the reason for your dissatisfaction with the service

satisfaction_message: Your satisfaction is our priority, and we look forward to serving you better.

validation.reason_required: Reason is required for a low rating

validation.idNumber_max: ID Number must be at most 10 characters

Error.title: Oops!
Error.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.
Error.description: Something went wrong while processing your request.
Error.suggestion: You can return to the homepage or try again.

CamMicPermissionAlert.message: We apologize, but we cannot serve you until you grant us access to your camera and microphone. This access is necessary to provide the best possible service.
CamMicPermissionAlert.guideMessage: To grant access, please go to your browser settings, find the camera and microphone permissions, and allow access for this site.
CamMicPermissionAlert.step2: Find the section for Camera and Microphone permissions.
CamMicPermissionAlert.step3: Locate the current website and allow access to both.

destructive.title: Uh oh! Something went wrong.
destructive.description: There was a problem with your request.
